-- General settings General
-- Homepage preference strings Set Homepage Set the browser\'s homepage Homepage Set the browser\'s homepage
-- Save data preference strings Save Data This saves data by preventing images from loading
-- Private Mode Preference strings Private Browsing This setting will reset your browsing instance and permanently delete all browsing data at the end of each browsing session. The theme changes to grey to indicate that this setting is enabled.
-- Rate App Preference strings Rate this app! If this app is useful to you, please take a moment and rate it! Thanks!
-- Feedback preference strings Send feedback Amped Browser Feedback
